r.s: Replacement for the default renderer that doesn't use table tags, and generates fully valid XHTML output.
r.d: Replacement for the default renderer of HTML_QuickForm that uses only XHTML and CSS but no table tags, and generates fully valid XHTML output.
r.n: - Request #10848: addStopFieldsetElements() now accepts also group names - Request #10850: an additional class name for the hidden fieldsets that are generated by addStopFieldsetElements() can now be specified via the new second parameter (the template variable {class} was added to the openHiddenFieldsetTemplate)
